meanings.definition: A substance that kills trichomonas parasites.
meanings.sent1: The trichomonacide effectively eliminated the harmful parasites.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian used trichomonacide to treat the infected animals.
meanings.sent3: The trichomonacide went to work like a superhero fighting off the invaders.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a trichomonacide, wiping out any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The trichomonacide worked its magic, eradicating the pesky parasites completely.

meanings.definition: The act of killing trichomonas parasites.
meanings.sent1: The trichomonacide was swift and effective in its action against the parasites.
meanings.sent2: The trichomonacide of the medication halted the spread of the infection.
meanings.sent3: The trichomonacide was like a brave knight on a mission to defeat the enemy.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a trichomonacide, silencing the doubts and fears around her.
meanings.sent5: The trichomonacide was a powerful force, putting an end to the parasite invasion.
